name: Phi Phi Island Day 2 Plan
values: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast at the resort/guesthouse.
Meet your longtail boat or speedboat for a full-day tour.
Visit the iconic Maya Bay (from the boat if direct access is restricted).
Dive into the clear waters for snorkeling at Loh Samah Bay.
Swim and relax in the stunning emerald waters of Pileh Lagoon.
Enjoy a delicious packed lunch on a secluded beach or on the boat.
Pass by Viking Cave and observe the playful monkeys at Monkey Beach.
Head back to Tonsai Pier, freshen up, and enjoy some downtime.
Hike up to one of Phi Phi's viewpoints for breathtaking sunset views.
Savor a seafood dinner and watch an exciting fire show on the beach.
